info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Access-Control-Allow-Headers: DNT,User-Agent,X-Requested-With,If-Modified-Since,Cache-Control,Content-Type,Range Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Access-Control-Expose-Headers: Content-Length,Content-Range Allow: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS Cache-Control: max-age=0, must-revalidate, private Content-Security-Policy: default-src https: 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src https: ; child-src https: platform.twitter.com; img-src https: data:; Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 22 May 2022 01:28:49 GMT Expires: Sun, 22 May 2022 01:28:49 GMT Pragma: no-cache Referrer-Policy: same-origin Set-Cookie: public=9f07652b8fc798d632512af530942ed0; path=/; secure; HttpOnly; SameSite=lax Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1 Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Cacheable: Cacheable X-Cdn-Pop: bhs X-Cdn-Pop-Ip: 137.74.122.0/26 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Request-Id: 792658311 X-Xss-Protection: 1;mode=block Prix des carburants en France, site gouvernemental

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr/'

Host: www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Access-Control-Allow-Headers: DNT,User-Agent,X-Requested-With,If-Modified-Since,Cache-Control,Content-Type,Range Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Access-Control-Expose-Headers: Content-Length,Content-Range Allow: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS Cache-Control: max-age=0, must-revalidate, private Content-Security-Policy: default-src https: 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src https: ; child-src https: platform.twitter.com; img-src https: data:; Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 22 May 2022 01:29:10 GMT Expires: Sun, 22 May 2022 01:29:10 GMT Pragma: no-cache Referrer-Policy: same-origin Set-Cookie: public=0db2a98dcb5aff529b66077cb1939827; path=/; secure; HttpOnly; SameSite=lax Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1 Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Cacheable: Cacheable X-Cdn-Pop: bhs X-Cdn-Pop-Ip: 137.74.122.0/26 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Request-Id: 1010598170 X-Xss-Protection: 1;mode=block Prix des carburants en France, site gouvernemental

Le prix des carburants À compter du 1er avril 2022, vous bénéficiez d’une remise de 15 ct d’€ par litre prise en charge par l’État

Actualité : À compter du 1er avril 2022, vous bénéficiez d'une remise de 15ct d'€ par litre prise en charge par l'État - Aide exceptionnelle à l'acquisition de carburant.

Rechercher des points de vente de carburants

Choix des carburants
Localisation *
    
Aller au contenu
Vous pouvez zoomer sur la carte à l'aide de ⇧ (shift) + Molette de défilement

Rechercher les points de vente pour un itinéraire

Choisissez 1 à 4 carburants

* champs obligatoires

    

    

Rechercher de l'aide ou des informations

Pour trouver des informations sur le prix des carburants ou sur le fonctionnement du site prix-carburants.gouv.fr,

veuillez d'abord consulter notre Foire aux questions avant, le cas échéant, de nous contacter
